webscript.description:
script to prepare the timestamp mark documento for digital signature and timestamp mark. accept one mandatory parameters as url parameter : requestType - values : json or xml - tell to the service that the body of this post request contains the corresponding request format the body of the post must contains an area with this parameters : json : {"digitalSignatureArea":"xxx", "nodeRef":"a"} xml :
xxx nodeRef
NodeRef must be the nodeRef a common parent of all document you need to sign in this format : workspace://SpacesStore/e55635f6-c8c9-4e0d-ae99-55e600a77a1d This service will return the digitalSignatureArea for subsequent remote digital signature calculation. The digitalSignatureArea it's an handle to be passed to next calls. for detail about format of content received, please see org.sinekarta.alfresco.webscript.request.DigitalSignatureInitRequest supported return types : xml, json default : xml To use this service you have to call : 1. timestampMarkInit - receiving a common parent of all document and , returning an digitalSignatureArea 2...n. timestampMarkPrepare - receiving digitalSignatureArea and the document to be signed, returning digitalSignatureArea n+1. timestampMarkApply - receiving digitalSignatureArea and a common parent of all document (same of 1), returning none The digitalSignatureArea it's an handle to be saved and passed to client part of digital signature.
